## Description
This building grows spirulina in ponds. It is furnished with a biology research lab with instruments.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Category:|Farming|
|Construction:|PRE_FABRICATED|
|Size:|6.0 x 9.0 m|
|Level:|0|
|Maintenance Period:|150|
|Power Demands:|2.0 kW|
|Offline Power Demands:|0.2 kW|
